Battera::
She smiled and nodded to Blackstorm. "Me too. I am new as well. I 
just joined here. Perceptor isn't all that happy with me. I am not 
the warrior he seeks." She let her head fall a bit.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

shut

with
